xyplot(HbA1c.IFCC ~ log(Glu), data = glu, pch = "*", cex = 2)
xyplot(ASAT ~ log(Glu), data = glu, pch = "*", cex = 2)
xyplot(log(ALAT) ~ log(Glu), data = glu, pch = "*", cex = 1.5)
